text: A light rain and crickets CHIRPING. Somewhere in the nigh DANCE MUSIC is blaring, but here it's only a whisper with beat. Water trickles out of a jagged pipe. Splashing up mud, th riverlet weaves through hamburger wrappers and sunbleache beer cans, spent condoms and an old Spin magazine. The tiny stream ripples past glass and trash and the body woman. Face up, breathing. Dead grass caught in her braid Her name is RONNA MARTIN. She's eighteen and bleeding. Bleeding a lot. She tries to         push herself up, but the dirt around Her legs are         useless. Despite it all, there's a s perverse joy         to her face, like she's just remembe punchline to         a favorite joke.
You know what I like best about Christmas? The surprises.
Pitch black. We hear an ENGINE and ROAD NOISE.
It's like, you get this box, and you're sure you know what's in it.
SPARKS. A cigarette lighter flares. We're in the trunk of a car with SIMON BAINES (22), a ski Brit with surfer hair. He looks around, realizes where he Panicked, he starts POUNDING and KICKING.
You shake it, you weigh it, and you're totally convinced you have it pegged. No doubt in your mind.
The lighter goes out. It's black again.

Claire looks over, looks away. Ronna heads for the door leading outside. SIMON Ronna, they wouldn't evict you at Christmas. You'd be ho-ho-homeless.
He follows her out the door.

Ronna forges ahead, ignoring him. SIMON Is that why all the overtime? How much do you owe? RONNA Three eighty. SIMON That's nothing. RONNA More than I got. SIMON I'll give you twenty right now for a blowjob.
She stops, turns on him. Her look could freeze lava. SIMON Handjob?
A beat. The start of a smile. Simon's just pushing her buttons. SIMON Ronna, do you want my shift? RONNA Serious?
SIMON I haven't punched in yet.

She only half-believes him. Simon's not prone to benevole SIMON [CONT'D] Look, my best mates are going to Las Vegas this weekend. I've never been -- I'm told it's incredible. If you took my shift, I could go with them. Everybody wins. (beat; she's not sold) Cash up front.
He peels off three twenties from his clip. She looks at t money, thinking. Finally, she takes it. RONNA Deal.
Beyond exhausted, she starts walking back to the store. A a beat... SIMON Ronna? Are you certain I couldn't have a blowjob?
Without turning back, she flips him off.

That means we don't just sell the products ourselves, we also recruit and manage teams who work under us. Jimmy.                              Jimmy in makeup. ADAM Jimmy? ZACK Jimmy. Jimmy.

look around from the edge of a van in the distance. ZACK
